1074655236625707008.text: Dai turns 1 year old today! We deployed December 17, 2017 when ETH was 720 USD. Since then, ETH price peaked at 1400, then steadily dropped to 80. Dai has maintained its peg to the US Dollar. Call it trial by fire  #HappyBirthDai
